text: A Slovak AM-50 laying a fast bridge over the Torysa (1995) AM 50 is an automatically launched assault bridge used by combat engineers for crossing narrow obstacles such as rivers, canals, and ditches. It is mounted on heavy vehicles, and can bridge a gap up to . ==See also== * Armoured vehicle- launched bridge *Bailey bridge ==References== Category:Combat Category:Military bridging equipment Category:Armoured vehicle-launched bridges Category:Armoured fighting vehicles of Czechoslovakia Category:Year of introduction missing
title: AM 50
